Text: Gary, you're awesome, always uploading my favourite shows, thanks so much =)
You are a wonderful man, I missed this on filmon last night as I was out, been waiting all day!  LOVE YOU ;) xxxx
Thanks a bunch Gary! waiting for Geordie shore now!!!
There is no avi version. You will have to either convert it, or watch it on your PC using VLC Media player. I'm sorry but I don't have the time to convert it and re-up it :(

thx Gary.  Is there any chance at all you will do 'I'm a celebrity get me out of here'? or will you leave that to tv team etc.  Just that as we follow you all the time and you are so reliable I wondered if you would be intersted at all in this one.  Prob is I think its on everyday, which is alot for you given what you already do... anyway thx mate.

Gaz, help!!!  No one is doing Geordie shore, the new season started last night!!  I already have to wait 5 days for someone to upload The Valleys, i cant wait that long for my Geordie Fix!!!!! PLEASE xxxxxxxxxxxxx
Oh, Dont worry, you can watch it on the MTV site, crisis averted, lol ;)

Sorry mate, I won't be doing I'm a celebrity. It is too much for me. I might have to have another operation, so I will only be uploading MIC from now on (That is considering I find it to upload!!). If I do have to go for the op, it will be in January, so I will still be around til then :)
hope everything goes ok Gary. We appreciate your efforts greatly.
